attributes.action: create a new tax regime for pensioners that reflect their needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent announcements made by the PM have mentioned the gold plated pensions of MP's with a view to make them more acceptable in the current economic climate. I would like to petition No 10 that a radical change in the direct taxation structure be made for pensioners to affect all pension income. Firstly I would like to see all the demeaning top up benefits dropped and the basic state pension doubled to at least £10k per year. Next I would like to see the non taxable level of pensions raised to £15k which I believe is a realistic level required for a minimum standard of living. The actual taxation levels proposed would be as follows. Pension income for £15k - £20k taxed at 10%, £20k - £30k taxed at 22% and £30k to £40k at 40%. From £40k to £100k income tax would rise exponentially to a maximum of 95% where it would stay for pensions in excess of this amount. These changes would address all pensioners life styles, it will be self funding & address's the current pension apartheid.
